meta-ibm
Ack
Is there any documentation for these?

These are the downstream association being pulled here.
I am not aware of any documentation for these. Are we looking for documentation under any specific file here?

These are defined in the yaml file.
https://github.com/openbmc/phosphor-dbus-interfaces/blob/master/yaml/xyz/openbmc_project/Inventory/Item/PCIeSlot.interface.yaml
Done
I assume these are documented somewhere too?
All the associations introduced in this commit has been documented. The commit via which the documentation has been pushed is included in the commit message.
Please address the review comments in the phosphor-dbus-interfaces commit before this can be merged.
